location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 24 September, and informing that the Governor approves of Bruce's instructions to the Commander of the Vestal, transporting the Honorable Company's horses to India.
